name: Internal Hellions
description:
Fight your inner demons or your inner human, and see who's sanity will last the longest.

A horror themed, fighting, 2D game with a dark twist to the happy fighting games. Explore different locations of your mind whilst battling your enemy. Perfect for two players for a quick match or who want to experience something different.

But remember:

Demons must beware of the pills that will make them weaker.

Humans must beware of insanity that makes them weaker.

May (in)sanity win.
